title: MD
biography: Meenakshi Chaudhary is an Indian actress and beauty pageant titleholder who works predominantly in Telugu and Tamil films. She represented the state of Haryana at the Femina Miss India 2018 pageant, where she was crowned as Femina Miss India Grand International 2018. Chaudhary represented India at Miss Grand International 2018 and finished as the first runner-up.
aiSummary: Meenakshi Bhat is a liver disease (india–canada collaboration) specialist with an H-index of 14 at Hepatology (Member). Has been published in Journal of Pediatric Neurosciences, Journal of Biosciences, Current Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
